tr.td: Our view is to unified effords and take advantage of the different expertise to provide a better life to abandoned and orphan children around the world. We believe that making a change requires a strong collaboration between different group of people. Our goal is to use the power from each of these groups and stream it to make a difference worldwide. The difference will happen when we are able to listen what are the real needs of the children and focus the projects that help them in order to achieve the change. This will not be possible without the experience in various areas of organizations with many years of experience in the field and countries that can provide resources. It will not be possible either without the power of individuals that are in touch with their community and are willing to help with their ideas.
